definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: The Shuanglong Lake is a shallow and urban lake, it had been a serious typical eutrophic lake.
sentences.chinese: 雙龍湖是淺水型城市湖泊，一度爲重富營養化湖泊。

sentences.english: Hull form of a high-speed shallow-water craft used in fresh water is presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文提供了一種內河淺水型高速艇艇型。

sentences.english: As shallow-water plants, phytoplankton are therefore starving to death, according to the findings.
sentences.chinese: 根據該研究，浮游植物爲淺水植物，因而餓死。

sentences.english: The catfish deposits its eggs in shallow water, generally dose to roots or close to reeds .
sentences.chinese: 鮎魚通常在葦根或葦幹附近的淺水裏產卵。

sentences.english: One new monitor is also needed.
sentences.chinese: 還需要一艘新的淺水炮艦。

sentences.english: The ice in the shallowest part was at this time several inches thinner than in the middle.
sentences.chinese: 那時，最淺水中的冰要比湖心的冰薄上好幾英寸。

sentences.english: Officials believe the shallow water will continue hindering shipping until June.
sentences.chinese: 官員預期，淺水滯留船隻會持續到六月。

sentences.english: The Colossi, like other ground units, will be able to move through shallow waters only.
sentences.chinese: 巨像，像其他的地面單位，只能在淺水中移動。

sentences.english: Boats often pile up on the rocks in the shallow water.
sentences.chinese: 船常常在淺水處觸礁擱淺。

sentences.english: In late Quaternary the lake shallowed and its water became salt-water.
sentences.chinese: 第四紀早期湖深水淡，晚期湖淺水鹹。

sentences.english: After walking in the shallow water we let her play in the sands.
sentences.chinese: 在淺水區走了一會兒之後我們就讓她去玩沙子。

sentences.english: A few shouts came from the water where some officers were having a water fight in the shallow surf.
sentences.chinese: 幾個軍官在淺水裏打水仗，傳來了幾聲嚷嚷聲。

sentences.english: The lifeguards held a sit-in protest at Repulse Bay in the afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 參加行動的救生員在淺水灣泳灘靜坐。

sentences.english: If you don't swim well, you can swim in the shallow area.
sentences.chinese: 假如你游泳的話，你可以在淺水處遊。

sentences.english: In front of the Empire State Building is a long rectangular wading pool.
sentences.chinese: 帝國大廈前面是一個長方形的淺水池。

sentences.english: This discovery supports the view that the Gufeng Formation was deposited in a restricted shallow water environment.
sentences.chinese: 這一發現同時支持孤峯組形成於侷限淺水環境的觀點。

definition: water so clear you can see the bottom
(bird species of China) grey heron (Ardea cinerea)
to lie in disarray/to cut across/to traverse
nuée ardente/hot cloud of volcanic ash
